hangle: 만약 영애의 아버지가 억지로 시킨 거라면 방으로 돌아가.
first_translate: if your father forced you to do this, you should go back to your room.
second_translate: If your father forced you into this, go back to your room.

first_translate: I’m doing this of my own volition, your highness.
second_translate: Everything is my own will, Your Highness.

first_translate: it’s a bit embarrassing to say this myself,
second_translate: It's a bit awkward to say this myself,

first_translate: but I’m quite attractive, don’t you think?

hangle: 여태 어디서 거절당한 경험이 한 번도 없답니다.
second_translate: I've never been turned down before.

hangle: 피오나 외의 여자는 아무런 의미도 없어.
first_translate: there’s no other woman besides fiona.
second_translate: No other woman matters to me except Fiona.

first_translate: this is giving me a headache.

hangle: 차라리 암살자였으면 두 동강을 냈을 텐데.
first_translate: if she were an assassin, I would have cut her in half.
second_translate: If she were an assassin, I would have completely destroyed her.

hangle: 게다가 피오나가 잔소리 한 것도 있고…
first_translate: but fiona also nagged me about this...
second_translate: Besides, Fiona also lectured me about it...

first_translate: you should be kind to the ladies!
second_translate: You should be kind to young ladies!

first_translate: if you’re not going to leave, I will.
second_translate: If you won’t leave, then I will.

first_translate: she tried to seduce you with her body?!
second_translate: She tried to seduce you physically?!

hangle: 세상에, 우리 황자님이 출세를 하긴 했나 보네!
first_translate: wow, it looks like our crown prince has made a name for himself!
second_translate: Wow, it looks like our prince has really made a name for himself!

first_translate: are you upset because I laughed?
second_translate: Are you sulking because I laughed?

first_translate: still, that lady was quite brave.
second_translate: Still, that lady was quite courageous.

first_translate: she must have really liked you.
second_translate: She must have been really into you.

second_translate: Who would have thought that little kid would turn out like this--

first_translate: hiccups go away when you’re surprised...
second_translate: Hiccups go away when you're startled...

first_translate: you don’t have to stall, siegren.

hangle: 사귀는 사이에 키스 정도로 이러는 것도 좀…
first_translate: it’s weird to be like this over a kiss when we’re dating...
second_translate: It's a bit strange to react this way over just a kiss when we're in a relationship...

I only meant to kiss you, but I lost control.
second_translate: I only intended to kiss you, but I lost control.

first_translate: if you do it again, I’ll hit you.

second_translate: Now that your hiccups are gone, I'll be going.
